definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Since I do not know the details, I can only generalize about the matter.
sentences.chinese: 由于不了解详情，我对此事只能泛泛而谈。

sentences.english: I'm just talking the abstract now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在只是在泛泛而谈。

sentences.english: He urged Obama not to speak in generalities.
sentences.chinese: 他敦促奥巴马不要泛泛而谈。
该发言人只是泛泛而谈。

definition: (of a writing etc) to have no substance (idiom)/to carry no weight
empty cave, nothing there (idiom); devoid of substance/nothing new to show
grandiose but impractical (idiom)/large but of no real use

lit. military tactics on paper (idiom)/fig. theoretical discussion that is worse than useless in practice/armchair strategist/idle theorizing/cf Zhao Kuo 趙括|赵括 leading an army of 400,000 to total annihilation at battle of Changping 長平之戰|长平之战 in 260 BC
careless/any-old-how, regardless of the specific task
pinyin: mei2 mao5 hu2 zi5 yi1 ba3 zhua1

definition: to dabble and stop (idiom); to dip into/to attempt half-heartedly/content with a smattering of knowledge
to dabble and stop (idiom); to dip into/to attempt half-heartedly/content with a smattering of knowledge/also written 淺嘗輒止|浅尝辄止
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
